mapper.select: SELECT f.WORK_TIME,d.DEPT_NM,(b.pjt_cd + e.SVC) PJT_NM ,b.PLAN_A,b.PLAN_B,b.PLAN_C,b.PLAN_D, b.PLAN_E,b.PLAN_F,b.PLAN_G,TOT_MD FROM (SELECT pjt_cd, SUM(PLAN_A)AS PLAN_A,SUM(PLAN_B)AS PLAN_B,SUM(PLAN_C)AS PLAN_C, SUM(PLAN_D)AS PLAN_D,SUM(PLAN_E)AS PLAN_E,SUM(PLAN_F)AS PLAN_F, SUM(PLAN_G)AS PLAN_G, SUM(TOT_MD)AS TOT_MD FROM T_P11050 GROUP BY pjt_cd) b JOIN T_P11000 a ON a.pjt_cd=b.pjt_cd JOIN T_HM1000 AS c ON c.EMP_NO=a.EMP_NO JOIN T_SC1010 AS d ON c.DEPT_CD=d.DEPT_CD JOIN T_PS1000 AS e ON a.PJT_CD=e.PJT_CD JOIN (SELECT PJT_CD, SUM(FLOOR(WORK_TIME)) WORK_TIME FROM T_PM1020 GROUP BY PJT_CD) AS f ON a.PJT_CD=f.PJT_CD ORDER BY DEPT_NM
